christmas.en: Christmas;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
christmas.fi: joulu;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
christmas.nl: Kerstmis;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized

christmas eve.en: Christmas Eve;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
christmas eve.fi: jouluaatto;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
christmas eve.nl: kerstavond;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized, but derived words are not

christmas day.en: Christmas Day;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
christmas day.fi: joulupäivä;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
christmas day.nl: eerste kerstdag;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized, but derived words are not

boxing day.en: Boxing Day;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
boxing day.fi: tapaninpäivä;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
boxing day.nl: tweede kerstdag;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized, but derived words are not

new year.en: New Year;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
new year.fi: uusivuosi;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
new year.nl: Nieuwjaar;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized

valentine's day.en: Valentine's Day;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
valentine's day.fi: ystävänpäivä;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
valentine's day.nl: Valentijnsdag;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized

epiphany.en: Epiphany;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
epiphany.fi: loppiainen;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
epiphany.nl: Driekoningen;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized

easter.en: Easter;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
easter.fi: pääsiäinen;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
easter.nl: Pasen;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized

first of may.en: First of May;;In English, the names of holidays are capitalized
first of may.fi: vappu;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
first of may.nl: Dag van de arbeid;;In Dutch, the names of holidays are capitalized

midsummer.fi: juhannus;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized

finnish independence day.fi: itsenäisyyspäivä;;In Finnish, the names of holidays are not capitalized
